data.text: @finn_with_1_n I have tried to write out why I disagree with this article 4 times now but simply cannot put it into 240 characters. I’ll have to talk to you about it some other time. But I’ll say now that I think it’s dead wrong
@Jonny_R_Dav rolled my eyes vigorously when it played out but this piece sums up everything for me
@finn_with_1_n Oh fuck You no that bench scene was phenomenal
@Jonny_R_Dav (left the cinema enjoying it but compared to the rest of the Oscar bunch that year, it does coast a looooooot)

@Jonny_R_Dav opening scene rules, Chastain is great throughout, the writing is typically great from Sorkin but my god does the film sag. can't remember anything about it except Idris Elba being Idris Elba, the opening scene and the phoned-in, cram-it-down-your-throat bench scene at the end
